name: Odyssey
description: Odyssey is a well-balanced hybrid strain that originated in San Francisco and quickly became popular in the Bay Area. This strain flowers at 7 to 8 weeks, producing large, dense buds that have a sweet, sugary aroma. Its candy flavor is best appreciated through a vaporizer and provides strong head-based effects. Some head pressure is common, but this strainâ€™s indica side comes out later, leading to a body-melting calm. Overall, Odyssey will take you on a smooth journey.
attributes_title: Focused, Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Tingly, Stress, Pain, Headaches, Depression, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Headache, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
